methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus dialog; if you have content with autofocus attribute, it will directly focus it

events.name: shake
events.description: Emitted when the Dialog shakes in order to catch user's attention, unless the 'no-shake' property is set

events.name: escape-key
events.description: Emitted when ESC key is pressed; Does not get emitted if Dialog is 'persistent' or it has 'no-esc-key' set

persistent.description: User cannot dismiss Dialog if clicking outside of it or hitting ESC key; Also, an app route change won't dismiss it

no-esc-dismiss.description: User cannot dismiss Dialog by hitting ESC key; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

no-backdrop-dismiss.description: User cannot dismiss Dialog by clicking outside of it; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

no-route-dismiss.description: Changing route app won't dismiss Dialog; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

auto-close.description: Any click/tap inside of the dialog will close it

seamless.description: Put Dialog into seamless mode; Does not use a backdrop so user is able to interact with the rest of the page too

full-width.description: Dialog will try to render with same width as the window

full-height.description: Dialog will try to render with same height as the window

position.description: Stick dialog to one of the sides (top, right, bottom or left)

square.description: Forces content to have squared borders

no-refocus.description: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets hidden, do not refocus on the DOM element that previously had focus

no-focus.description: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets shown, do not switch focus on it

no-shake.description: Do not shake up the Dialog to catch user's attention

allow-focus-outside.description: Allow elements outside of the Dialog to be focusable; By default, for accessibility reasons, QDialog does not allow outer focus
